data.title: Tesla Feels the Heat as Walmart Sues
data.text: Walmart just sued Tesla over SolarCity manufactured and installed panels that resulted in rooftop fires at seven of its stores.

data.title: Tesla shares singed after Walmart sues over solar panel fires
data.text: Walmart is suing Tesla over their solar panel fires at seven of its stores.

data.title: Walmart Takes Tesla to Court Over Faulty Solar Panels
data.text: Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) is no stranger to lawsuits. Hundreds of disgruntled customers have filed individual and class-action suits alleging faults in its electric vehicles, as well as in its solar panels.

data.title: Walmart is suing Tesla over a solar panel fire, here's what you need to know
data.text: Walmart is suing Tesla after some of Tesla's solar panels caught fire at seven Walmart stores.

data.title: Walmart suing Tesla over faulty solar panels
data.text: Fox Business Briefs: Walmart is suing Elon Musk's company for gross negligence, breach of contract and failure to meet industry standards.

data.title: Tesla slides on news of Walmart suing over solar panel fires
data.text: Shares of Tesla slid Wednesday on news of Walmart's lawsuit.

data.title: Walmart Sues Tesla Over Solar Panel Fires
data.text:
Walmart (WMT) is suing Tesla (TSLA) over trouble it has with the company's solar panels catching fire and causing damage.
The post Walmart Sues Tesla Over Solar Panel Fires appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: Walmart sues Tesla over solar panel rooftop fires
data.text: Yahoo Finance's Alexis Keenan reports on the Walmart lawsuit alleging problems with solar panels that were installed and maintained  by Tesla's solar division.

data.title: Tesla Stock Needs to Start Trading Like a Car Stock
data.text: Tesla still needs to prove it can make big money on electric cars. Until it does Tesla stock is massively over valued.

data.title: Tesla Has Failed Massively As A Public Company
data.text: Musk’s greatest skill is in raising capital, but in the past five years that new capital—in excess of $20 billion—has led to greater losses and a much, much more levered balance sheet for Tesla.

data.title: Walmart Sues Tesla: Pay Us For Solar Panel Damages You Caused
data.text: Walmart Inc (NYSE: WMT) is demanding Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) pay for damages caused at seven stores and remove solar panels from hundreds of other retail locations.

data.title: Top tech analyst says electric vehicles from Jaguar and Audi are stealing market share from Tesla
data.text: Toni Sacconaghi said increased competition abroad is responsible for the weakness in Tesla's sales volume.

data.title: Walmart Suing Tesla for Years of Gross Negligence
data.text: Tesla's struggling solar panel business was just dealt a reputational blow.
